nodes.text: Cova was a pilot for the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. During a mission to the planet Arda II, Cova was attacked and wounded by Imperial-aligned businessman Mag Doum in a Diodem testing plant in the city Tun Wala. As Darth Vader was attacking the planet, local pilot Zon Zorad flew Cova's fighter due to Cova's injuries.
